content:
Nice reverse puzzle. I have nothing to say regarding the setup of the problem statement, since I have no experience with reverse-mode-only problems. But I would definitely consider adding a constraint for "n".

Also, I would suggest adding a test case where the hexadecimal part of the answer ends with a b :)

I just need to know how to setup the puzzle for the Reverse Mode.

I've already picked the gamemode "Reverse" but still I need to write an Input and Output description.
Thanks and yeah I will add a constraint for n.
